name: BreakFit (Flash)
description:
Overview

Created as a 2 or 3 day project to learn a bit more about flash. It was meant to be a mix between Brick Breaker and Tetris.

Instructions

Destroy the blue blocks that would overlap with the red blocks. Create one solid line at the end.

Controls:

  • Arrows: Move
  • Spacebar: Destroy Blue Block
  • You can loop from the top to the bottom.
    • If you are at the top row and press "Up," you will teleport to the bottom row

Notes

  • The "Instructions" button does not work
  • The High Score button does not work.
